extension.description: Displays a skip button during intro and credits sequences. Reads timing data from .skiptro.json files next to video files.
extension.news:
v0.3.0 - Skipping property stays set until seek and buffering are done - Auto-skip won't repeat when seeking back into intro - Fix property cleanup between files
v0.2.0 - Auto-skip intro setting - Window properties for skin integration - Skipping property for hiding skin elements during seeks
v0.1.0 - Initial release - Skip intro button during playback - Reads .skiptro.json files next to video files - Configurable auto-dismiss timeout
